about_the_game:
Trap Labs Original Soundtrack
Composed and performed by Chris Donnelly

Soundtrack includes both 320kbps MP3 and lossless 24-bit FLAC for your enjoyment.

Tracklist
1. Title
2. Elevator
3. The Lobby
4. PARTy Room Da Bombs (Boss 1)
5. The Office
6. PARTy Room Mah Lazer (Boss 2)
7. The Factory
8. PARTy Room Vortex (Boss 3)
9. Question Marks
10. PARTy Room Armed (Boss 4)
11. Race Me
12. The End (Credits)
